Clip.Title: TANK ON THE MOON
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Revealing near-lost stories about Soviet-made robots that patrolled the Lunar surface in the 1970s.

Clip.Title: THE INCREDIBLE BIONIC MAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The quest to build and animate an artificial being entirely from bionic parts shows the incredible strides we've made in body replacement technologies.

Clip.Title: BOTS OR BODIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Is man or machine better equipped to handle the rigors and risks of space exploration? Now that Mars is in our sights, would we be pushing our luck or pushing the boundaries?

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the highlands of the Americas to the world-famous tidal flats of the Bay of Fundy, this exploration of Nova Scotia reveals some of the world's best-kept secrets - here, on the edge of Canada.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Americans are invading and Lower Canada is undermanned, forcing Charles de Salaberry to rely on cunning tactics.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out why some inquiring minds believe that the world is headed for ruin within the next century.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Water in the World's 8th Largest Economy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As world population increases, the struggle over one of the earth's most valuable resources continues to intensify. Take a look at water in California, the world's 8th largest economy. Is the world in danger of running out of water?

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Journey into the Ice Age and Solar Eclipse Chasers
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey back into the days of the Ice Age and see what life was like. And, meet eclipse chasers - adventurers who travel the world to witness and document solar eclipses.

Clip.Title: THE INCREDIBLE BIONIC MAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The quest to build and animate an artificial being entirely from bionic parts shows the incredible strides we've made in body replacement technologies.

Clip.Title: KURU: SCIENCE AND THE SORCERY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An Australian researcher discovers the cause of a crippling plague in New Guinea, and finds how the affliction the isolated tribe suffers from became a global concern.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: The quest to build and animate an artificial being entirely from bionic parts shows the incredible strides we've made in body replacement technologies.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In depth vignettes on issues impacting modern Canadians, taken from the pages of the popular Magazine.

Clip.Title: WALRUS TV

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Burlesque artist Dita von Teese drops by to find the perfect frock for a red-carpet event, while a costume designer from "Glee" shops for the cast's wardrobe. It's just another day at the office inside L.A.'s finest vintage store, The Way We Wore(r).

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Award season means four months of high-exposure events. It also means four months of madness for the vintage clothing boutique The Way We Wore(R). Follow store owner Doris Raymond and her team as they scout vintage gems for the stylists to the stars.

Clip.Title: REAL STORY; THE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: PHIL COLLINS: GOING BACK TO DETROIT
Clip.Episode: Phil Collins: Going Back to Detroit
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow Phil Collins back to the birthplace of Motown, as he joins the Funk Brothers for one soul-filled night of legendary music.
